Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Honor[ENDCOLOR] improves the effectiveness of one's army in a variety of ways.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Honor gives a +33% combat bonus VS Barbarians. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire for each enemy unit killed. Unlocks building the Statue of Zeus.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Honor tree will grant [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each enemy unit killed. It also allows the purchase of Great Generals with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.
